main event: Pilot of F-86D observed a bright pulsing object in the evening sky over Ramstein AB, Germany, while it was also detected on ground radar.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 3-5 minutes., The object pulsed or flashed at regular intervals., The object disappeared from visual and radar observation., The pilot was unable to intercept the object., The report concludes that the performance of the object exceeds capabilities of any known vehicles or phenomena.
sighted object: a bright pulsing object in the sky
